images.caption: The Night\'s Watch inspecting the heart tree at the deserted wildling village Whitetree during The Great Ranging - by  Matt Olson \xc2\xa9

name: Whitetree
summary: Whitetree is a small free folk village beyond the Wall. Its name comes from the giant heart tree that is located in its midst. The village is named on one of Castle Black's old maps. There are other villages south of Whitetree, at least three of them. To the north lies water, possibly a lake, and to the west some small hills.[1]
